title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. That none shall be elected into any office whatsoever, that hath been in the Kings army, ayding or assisting the enemy against the Parliament, within the kingdom of England, dominion of Wales, and town of Berwicke. Die Jovis 9 Septemb. 1647.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old Bailey,
notes: No person that hath been in arms against the Parliament, etc. may be elected mayor or any officer in England and Wales; if elected the election is void. This does not extend to persons who have been discharged from seqestration -- Cf. Steele.
Order to print signed: Jo. Brown Cler. Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
